PolkaSpots Supafly WiFi


Specialist WiFi network design and management.

We've been designing and managing WiFi networks for over 10 years. We work with all kinds of business - private banks, councils, schools, stadiums, retail parks and more.

If you'd like help with your WiFi get in touch.
